```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(viridis)
library(ggprism)
```

```{r}
Shrb2 <- read.csv("../Data/ShrbRNAiPhenotypePenetrance2.csv")
```

```{r}
Shrb2.summary <- Shrb2 %>% group_by(Repeat, Genotype) %>% summarize(yes = sum(Phenotype == "Yes"), n = n(), percent = yes/n)
```

```{r}
ggplot(Shrb2.summary, aes(x = Genotype, y = percent)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_point() +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent, limits = c(0,1)) +
  theme_prism() +
  labs(x = "", y = "") +
  labs(x = "Genotype", y = "Phenotype Penetrance (%)") +
 scale_fill_brewer("Blues") 
ggsave("../Results/ShrbRNAiPenetrance2.pdf")
```
